snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany faces the task of getting Europe growing again while continuing to advocate her austerity policies to the German electorate.
abstract: Chancellor Angela Merkel faces the task of getting Europe growing again while continuing to advocate her austerity policies to the German electorate; Europe, as a whole, is increasingly finding fault with the very austerity programs that have brought Merkel success in Germany.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany faces the task of getting Europe growing again while continuing to advocate her austerity policies to the German electorate.

headline.seo: Europe Looks to Merkel of Germany to Revive Economy
headline.main: Revival of Europe’s Economy Falls to German Leader
headline.print_headline: Revival of Europe’s Economy Falls to German Leader
